text: Gavin Ernest Royfee (20 February 1929 in Christchurch â€“ 10 July 2023 in Spreydon, Christchurch) was a New Zealand first-class cricketer who played three first-class matches for Canterbury in Plunket Shield in the 1952/53 season. ==Other websites== * * Gavin Royfee at CricketArchive Category:1929 births Category:2023 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Christchurch
title: Gavin Royfee
